MockNodeEeprom
public
NodeEeprom
MockNodeEeprom

Used as a Mock object for reading and writing to Wireless Nodes' eeproms, which just uses the cache for this Mock object.

Functions

const 
WirelessNode_Impl* 
node,
const 
BaseStation& 
base,
const 
NodeEepromSettings& 
settings
)

Creates an Eeprom object.

Parameters
nodeAddress

The address of the Node to access the Eeprom of.

base
const BaseStation&

The BaseStation to use for communicating with the Node.

settings
const NodeEepromSettings&

The NodeEepromSettings to use.
